entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 70%
